toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field will be utilized in implementations where a user can order for multiple accounts inclusive or exclusive of their own. The effective account is used to control the entitlements, pricing, integrations etc that drive the site experience.

toolingEntityParticle.Label: FOCIS Category
toolingEntityParticle.Name: FOCIS_Category__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>ccrz__E_Order__c.FOCIS_Category__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>IF( ccrz__Storefront__c = 'CREStore', '43', IF( ccrz__Storefront__c = 'CPS', '45', IF( ccrz__Storefront__c = 'GeneralStore', IF( NSSCCConnector_from_SFCC__c=TRUE, '46', IF( Opportunity_Order__r.Override_Channel__c = false, '42', IF( Opportunity_Order__r.Override_Channel__c = true, '47', IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity_Order__c)),Opportunity_Order__r.RecordType.Name != 'Sales Opportunity',Opportunity_Order__r.RecordType.Name != 'Order Opportunity'), '48', '46') ) ) ), '') ) )</formula> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>FOCIS Category</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: If the Shipping State is provided, it will be used, otherwise the Billing State will be used for tax jurisdiction.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Tax State
toolingEntityParticle.Name: Tax_State__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>ccrz__E_Order__c.Tax_State__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>If the Shipping State is provided, it will be used, otherwise the Billing State will be used for tax jurisdiction.</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ccrz__Account__r.ShippingState)), ccrz__Account__r.ShippingState, ccrz__Account__r.BillingState)</formula> <inlineHelpText>If the Shipping State is provided, it will be used, otherwise the Billing State will be used for tax jurisdiction.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Tax State</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>
